instruction: What kinds of spectral feature processing methods were used to develop a prediction model for mapping land use and land cover (LULC)?

instruction: What metric was chosen to develop a prediction model for mapping land use and land cover (LULC)?

instruction: What machine learning strategies were employed in the related study to train the prediction model for mapping land use and land cover using multi-spectral satellite images?
Output: The machine learning strategies employed in the related study to train the prediction model for mapping land use and land cover using multi-spectral satellite images include Support Vector Machines (SVMs), Decision Trees (DTs), Random Forests (RFs), Normal Bayes (NB), and Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs).
